settings.text:
At Voxtur Bio Limited, our manufacturing capabilities are designed to deliver excellence at scale. Spanning 40,000 square feet, our state-of-the-art facility is FDA-licensed and accredited with GMP, ISO 9001:2015, and ISO 13485:2016 (BSI) certifications, ensuring compliance with the highest quality standards.

With an installed capacity of 120 million test kits per annum, we are one of the largest IVD manufacturers in the region, equipped to meet both domestic and global demand efficiently.

We take pride in our expertise in customized product development, offering tailor-made solutions to meet the specific needs of our customers. Our flexible manufacturing approach allows us to develop and deliver specialized diagnostic products for diverse healthcare applications.As pioneers in Companion Diagnostics, we excel in creating precision-driven diagnostic solutions that enable personalized healthcare. These advanced tests align treatments with patient-specific conditions, optimizing outcomes and revolutionizing healthcare delivery.

Additionally, our robust manufacturing infrastructure is complemented by our DSIR-approved in-house R&D capabilities, allowing seamless integration of innovation and production. This synergy empowers us to develop and manufacture cutting-edge diagnostic solutions, from rapid test kits to high-performance reagents.

Looking to the future, we are actively pursuing WHO Prequalification and European Certifications, paving the way for global market penetration and reinforcing our position as a trusted partner in diagnostics worldwide.

With our focus on innovation, scalability, and customization, Voxtur Bio is committed to shaping the future of diagnostics with unparalleled precision and quality.
